Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 33rd overall pick, by San Francisco in 2017...
Injured on 4/10/2017 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from San Francisco to Montreal on 2/12/2018 (Going to SF: P Martin Sherrard. Going to MON: CF Ezra Delao, P Bill Freeman, 2B Jose Herrera)...
Had first career hit on 5/19/2020, off Esteban Herrero (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/9/2020, off Peter Blind (PHI)...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against St. Louis (C) on 10/1/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2021, hitting .440 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Injured on 9/15/2022 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2023, hitting .370 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 5/31/2023...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2023, hitting .388 with 6 HR, 21 RBI...
Injured on 6/19/2023 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2023, hitting .538 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won MVP in 2023, hitting .328 with 16 HR, 87 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2023...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,957,143 through salary arbitration...
